post.author: 권경화
post.content:
NEXT FREE SEMINAR: November 4th, 2004
9 am to 12 noon, Ramada Hotel 2 Holiday Drive map @ (http://www.torwug.org/local/events.asp ) Speakers Include: Nokia, Microsoft
Topic: Smart Phones - Another Transformative Technology? Mobile handsets running business and consumer applications are becoming more prevalent. Smart phones come in different varieties, operating systems and with different market purposes. This session will try to sort out the different devices and what purpose they serve in the market.
REGISTER NOW to book your seat. Registration on-line: http://www.torwug.org/local/events.asp
post.title: Toronto Wireless User Group Seminar
